column_description: Unique identifier for each field in country or state
Comment: from 2018 until including 2021 not unique ID, but polygons of subsections in a field have same ID

column_description: Unique identifier for each farm in country
The original crop name translated into English
The machine-readable HCAT name of the crop
The 10-digit HCAT code indicating the hierarchy of the crop
Indicates whether a field was organically cultivated or not. Values: [0,1]
